title: chat banned unfairly
body: i played a game which ended up being a troll game for almost everyone involved, the enemy jungler was autofilled and so was our support, the enemy jungler decided to play support to top lane which made me have a bad game until we surrendered but i still played and tried to win until it was clear i was to far behind to even 1v1 a support so instead i just tried to farm top lane, our bottom lane fed hard and complained about it the whole time, he then basically attacked me later in the game when i said something about being unhappy with a 2v1 i muted him after trying to explain my self and he simply continued to attack me, after another two games which went well my account has just gotten a chat ban for 14 games which i truly dont believe i deserve, is there some way i can talk to an admin or someone to have it removed or at least reduced? i can show my chat log to see if i said something that deserves a chat ban

replies.body:
In order to appeal a punishment, you'll need to submit a ticket to [Support](https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) (use the "Discuss a personal suspension or restriction" option). They'll manually review the case, determine if there's reason for a reduction/removal, and if not they'll be able to provide additional context that you likely wont be able to get from anyone else.

Generally speaking, any negative behaviour you may have exhibited could have contributed to a punishment, and depending on the types of behaviours and how much there was it may or may not have been enough to trigger a punishment. The tier of punishment would depend on your account history and standing (for example, if you received a 25-game chat restriction within the last several months, a 14-day suspension would make sense as the next punishment). Without further context (chat logs relevant to this case, and punishment history), we wont be able to provide more specific context for you.
